title: Fifty Shades of Rapunzel
description: The adults-only adventures of Rapunzel in a fractured fairytale world….From birth, Rapunzel has been promised as a bride to the seven troll kings of the netherworld. When Prince Snow climbs into the tower where Rapunzel is kept captive, she begs him to prepare her for the demands of the trolls on her wedding night.Having had a taste of the sexy Prince Snow, the nubile twenty-one-year-old Rapunzel begins her sexual awakening. The troll kings capture Rapunzel and the prince and take them to their underworld kingdom. Rapunzel escapes and vows to return to rescue Prince Snow. But with hard-bodied bandits, a submissive-seeking duke, a 'master pollinator' faery king, three raunchy bears and other lusty beings lurking in the woods, Rapunzel keeps finding herself distracted…(The entire Fifty Shades of Rapunzel series in a novella format)
author: Mia Abbey
